title: Opinion of the European Economic and Social Committee on 'Proposal for a Directive of the European Parliament and of the Council on measures for a high common level of cybersecurity across the Union, repealing Directive (EU) 2016/1148 and Proposal for a Directive of the European Parliament and of the Council on the resilience of critical entities' (COM(2020) 823 final - 2020/0359 (COD) - COM(2020) 829 final - 2020/0365 (COD))
